example.code:
PS C:\> Start-GLCJob -VaultName myvault -JobType "archive-retrieval" -JobDescription "archive retrieval" -ArchiveId "o9O9j...TX-TpIhQJw"
JobId JobOutputPath Location ----- ------------- -------- op1x...JSbthM /012345678912/vaults/test/jobs/op1xe...I4HqCHkSJSbthM
example.description: Starts a job to retrieve an archive from the specified vault owned by the user. The status of the job can be checked using the Get-GLCJob cmdlet. When the job completes successfully the Read-GCJobOutput cmdlet can be used to retrieve the contents of the archive to the local file system.
